I worked under Andy Coulson for a year and a half at NOTW.`` The real scandal is David Cameron would have been briefed:` We can probably get away with this one,' when hiring Andy Coulson , so Mr. David Cameron is either a liar or an idiot. Andy Coulson was editor of the Rupert Murdoch-owned News of The World in 2006, when the paper's royal editor, Clive Goodman , was arrested for hacking into voicemails belonging to Princes David Cameron and Harry. At a time when 50 million Americans lack health insurance and when the cost of health care continues to soar, we must do all we can to lower the costs and improve the quality of care.
